*search* a pattern in quickfix window
{{{
:vimgrep /pattern/ %
:copen
}}}

search every *buffer* in vim
{{{
:bufdo vimgrep /pattern/ %
}}}

show more detailed *map* info
{{{
:verbose map
}}}

*redirect* screen massage to register
{{{
:redir @a
:echo
:redir END
}}}

*set* filetype
{{{
setf html
}}}

digraph table
{{{
:h digraph-table
}}}
